pausetweaks.settings.height.name: Pause Height
pausetweaks.settings.height.hint: Adjusts the height of the entire pause popup. (Default: 50)
pausetweaks.settings.scale.name: Pause Scale
pausetweaks.settings.scale.hint: Adjusts the scale of the entire pause popup. (Default: 100)
pausetweaks.settings.spinspeed.name: Spin Speed
pausetweaks.settings.spinspeed.hint: Adjusts the speed of the spinning animation. (Default: 50)
pausetweaks.settings.smallerbg.name: Smaller Background
pausetweaks.settings.smallerbg.hint: Reduces the width and height of the background gradient.
pausetweaks.settings.nospin.name: Disable Spin Animation
pausetweaks.settings.nospin.hint: Allows you to disable the spinning animation.
pausetweaks.settings.spindirection.name: Reverse Spin Animation
pausetweaks.settings.spindirection.hint: Allows you to reverse the spinning animation.
pausetweaks.settings.pulse.name: Disable Pulse Animation
pausetweaks.settings.pulse.hint: Allows you to disable the pulsing animation.
pausetweaks.settings.text.name: Paused Text
pausetweaks.settings.text.hint: Allows you to customise the displayed text. (Default: Game Paused)
pausetweaks.settings.img.name: Paused Image
pausetweaks.settings.img.hint: Allows you to customise the displayed image. (Default: ui/pause.svg)
